game.name: TinyShot
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tinyshot is a 2D wave-based arcade shooter. Follow Tiny on his journey after he makes a foolish and naive deal with the devil to retrieve his lost horn and earn love and fame in return.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tinyshot is a 2D wave-based arcade shooter. Follow Tiny on his journey after he makes a foolish and naive deal with the devil to retrieve his lost horn and earn love and fame in return.
